_field_real.name: transient score time{multi kill window}:s#how long does transient score stay onscreen
EMP kill window#time after taking a guys shields down with emp damage you have to get the emp kill bonus (seconds)
Cowbell explosion acceleration multiplier#acceleration multiplier from explosions if cowbell is enabled
Famine ammo multiplier#scalar multiplier to determine what percentage of normally dropped ammo will drop if famine is on
Score delta display seconds (max)#How long to display accumulated points
Score delta display seconds (incremental)#How long to extend the timer when displaying accumulated points, extended every time accumulated points increases
